attributes.action: convince Dave to commission a series X of Red Dwarf
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The three part TV special 'Red Dwarf: Back To Earth' was fantastic and incredibly successful. The digital channel Dave should be commended for commissioning this special. This petition is to ask the PM to put pressure on Dave to commission a series X so Red Dwarf can continue to grace our screens.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
